TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResultProperties

Docs.summary: Interface to retrieve a property value from property collection of recognition result.

MemberSignature.Value: public T Get<T> (Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.ResultPropertyKind propertyKind);

abstract member Get : Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.ResultPropertyKind -> 'T

Docs.typeparam: The type of property. only string, int and bool are supported.
Docs.summary: Returns value of the property in type . The property must have the same type as . Currently only string, int and bool are allowed. If the property value is not defined, a default value is returned: an empty string if is string, 0 if is int, and false if is bool.
